name: The Battle of Nations: I Will Subdue the World Through Pangu
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: The spiritual qi is revived, the mythological arena descends, the gods of each country arrive, Sakura awakens Amaterasu Omikami, the Eagle Federation summons Odin, and Shila summons Zeus.Only the Chinese are missing, leaving them in danger!I have traveled across the world, and I know all of history. I have summoned the Great Pangu! Gods are forbidden in China!
